title.rendered: 2022 Monaco Grand Prix Travel Package Rates

content.rendered:
2022 Monaco Grand Prix Travel Package Rates

The rates below are based on a package including four nights hotel stay and premium grandstand tickets. However, you can completely customize your package with VIP race viewing upgrades, additional events and parties, extra nights, day tours, room upgrades and other add-ons.
Hotel PackagePackages From
Le Meridien Nice$6,695
Le Meridien Monte Carlo (Seaview Room)$11,735
Hôtel Metropole$15,480
Hôtel HermitageCall for rates
Contact our sports travel specialists for your custom trip quote.
*Rates are per person in USD based on double occupancy. Single occupancy rates are available. Triple and Quad occupancy may be available. A 75% deposit is required to secure your package. Final balance will be due 90 days prior to travel. Availability and pricing subject to change prior to booking.
